title: Important Update: ICAI CA Intermediate Paper 5 (Auditing and Ethics) Rescheduled to January 19, 2026
content:
# Important Update: ICAI CA Intermediate Paper 5 (Auditing and Ethics) Rescheduled to January 19, 2026

Ek important update hai. ICAI ne Chartered Accountants Intermediate Examination, Paper – 5 (Auditing and Ethics) ke schedule mein change announce kiya hai.

This decision has been taken in partial modification of their earlier announcement dated September 23, 2025.

*   **Reason for Rescheduling:** The examination has been re-scheduled due to the general elections of Municipal Corporations in the State of Maharashtra.
*   **Old Exam Date:** The exam for Paper – 5 (Auditing and Ethics) was earlier scheduled for January 15, 2026 (Thursday).
*   **New Exam Date:** This paper will now be conducted on January 19, 2026 (Monday).
*   **Applicability:** This change applies to candidates appearing for the examination across India and abroad.
*   **Other Details:** The examination timings (2 PM to 5 PM IST) and examination centres will remain the same. The admit cards already issued will be valid for the re-scheduled date, and there is no change in the schedule for other examination papers.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/post.html?post_id=27771)

*Published on: 29 December 2025*
